trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGFSTLITTLESOLACE_00128_KNOLEXIA_000_000<tab>This one greets walking one. Does walking one need something of this one?
TEXT_REGFSTLITTLESOLACE_00128_KNOLEXIA_000_010<tab>This one is called Knolexia. This one is tasked with weaving for the benefit of all these ones.
TEXT_REGFSTLITTLESOLACE_00128_KNOLEXIA_000_011<tab>These ones are skilled at weaving. With needle and thread, these ones can make most anything, even houses!
TEXT_REGFSTLITTLESOLACE_00128_KNOLEXIA_000_012<tab>Walking one notices embroidery on homes? Enchanted patterns for repelling dark things!
TEXT_REGFSTLITTLESOLACE_00128_KNOLEXIA_000_020<tab>This place is called Little Solace, new home of these ones.
TEXT_REGFSTLITTLESOLACE_00128_KNOLEXIA_000_021<tab>These ones used to live happily deep in the wood, but then naughty ones went and summoned a primal one.

TEXT_REGFSTLITTLESOLACE_00128_KNOLEXIA_000_022<tab>Fearing naughty ones who became touched ones, these ones fled the homeland. Thanks to horned one Kan<var 1F /var>E, these ones could build a new home here.
TEXT_REGFSTLITTLESOLACE_00128_KNOLEXIA_000_023<tab>This one knows not when, but someday these ones will return home. This one is hopeful!
